content: 36 39 sts on each needle join to begin working in the round being careful not round 1 *k1 with cc1 k1 with cc2* repeat to twist * - * to the end of the round with mc knit 10 rnds purl one round and knit round 2 bring and keep both cc1 and cc2 to 10 rnds the front p1 with cc1 *pick up cc2 from under cc1 and p1 with cc2 pick up cc1 from undo provisional cast-on if necessary and under cc2 and p1 with cc1 * repeat * - * to pick up 60 66 72 78 sts along the cast-on the end of the round cc1 and cc2 will edge onto a spare circular needle fold work overlap and entwine on the rs of the work in half along the purl row leaving stockinette and cc1 and cc2 yarns will become twisted as facing out and the provisional cast-on edge you work do not untwist them inside the folded cuff knit each stitch on the outside needle together with the round 3 keep both cc1 and cc2 in front p1 corresponding stitch on the inside needle with cc1 *pick up cc2 over cc1 and p1 with thus attaching the fold there are now 30 33 cc2 pick up cc1 over cc2 and p1 with cc1 * 36 39 sts on each needle repeat * - * to the end of the round cc1 and cc2 twine in the opposite direction on the rs of the work forming the braid while the two yarns will untwist again for the second sock work a left-leaning latvian braid by working the rounds described in the following order round 1 round 3 and finally round 2 kanteletar socks page 2/9 leg continued from the previous page heel extension next work chart s1 m1 l1 xl1 each chart set-up round k14 k16 k17 k19 place m1 k1 row is repeated 10 11 12 13 times in each place m2 knit to the end of the round round round 1 work the established slipped-stitch then work chart s2 m2 l2 xl2 each chart pattern to m1 sm and m1l knit to m2 m1r row is repeated 3 times in each round and sm work the established slipped-stitch pattern to the end of the round please note finally work chart s1 m1 l1 xl1 each that the heel extension between the markers chart row is repeated 10 11 12 13 times in replaces one slipped-stitch column so that each round after m2 the slipped-stitch pattern will start *k1 with cc1 k1 with cc2* repeat * - * to *k5 sl1* for all sizes the end of the round work a right-leaning round 2 knit latvian braid first sock or a left-leaning latvian braid second sock as described on repeat rnds 1 and 2 a total of 11 12 13 14 the previous page cut cc1 and cc2 and times there are now 23 25 27 29 sts in the continue with mc
